game.name: He is Coming
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 세상의 잊혀진 구석, 깊은 곳에서 어둠의 세력이 꿈틀대며 마왕이 다시 한번 도래합니다. 이 로그라이트 RPG 자동 전투 게임에서 지혜를 갈고 닦아, 강력한 유물을 찾고, 종말에 맞서 굳건하게 살아남으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deep in the forgotten corners of the world, a dark force stirs – the Demon King rises once more. Sharpen your wits, seek out powerful artifacts, and stand firm in the face of the apocalypse in this roguelite RPG auto battler.

reviewHighlights.text: This game has some very absorbing gameplay, but if you're thinking of getting it, you should know it just doesn't feel finished. Two levels and a PvP...
Though it was a PvE only game turns out it was PvE and PvP where things are balanced around the PvP aspect of the game.
